app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

- Discover Now Playing / Popular / Top / Trending / Upcoming / Best Of Years Movies & TV Shows
- Quick search for movies and TV series by title
- Watch trailers and other videos
- Create your own watchlists for movies
- TV series calendar
- Detailed information about movies and TV series
- Rate Movies/TV shows in app and explore other rating
- Complete list of episodes for TV series with complete information about the episodes
- Search for services where you can buy, rent, stream films and series
- Watch videos (HD fullsreen) about movies and TV shows without leaving the app
- Profiles of actors with their full filmography
- Simple and user-friendly application interface
- Browsing history
- No account required

Disclaimer: 
In the application, you cannot watch films and series for free, but you can find in the application a complete description of the series and films and also the service on which you can watch them.

All movies information and images are from TMDB.org licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/

This app uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb: https://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api/terms-of-use

WebComics™ is the ultimate destination for Comic & Manhwa fans worldwide, offering the latest and hottest authentic comic series. Whether you're a fan of Manga, Manhwa, or Webtoon, we provide exhilarating and high-definition comic reads of numerous genres, including Romance, Action, Fantasy, Comedy, BL, GL, Drama, Horror, and more. If you fancy billionaires, destined partners, dominant CEOs, vampires, love triangles, otherworldly adventures, time-travel, enemies-to-lovers, or contractual marriage, it's your go-to platform for reading the best stories. Come and enjoy reading webtoons on www.webcomicsapp.com.
 
Why Choose WebComics™
1. A World of Infinite Comic & Manga Excitement
WebComics™ presents top-notch and exclusive comics, manga & manhwa from acclaimed creators across the globe. Our all-covered genres cater to your every interest and preference!
2. Unparalleled Experience in Reading Exclusive Comics & Manhwa
WebComics™ offers a plethora of exclusive original manhwa, manga & webtoons featuring distinctive and innovative storytelling, unparalleled creativity, and a reading experience that stands out as top-tier.
3. Daily Free Reading Privileges
Indulge in daily free reading perks on WebComics™, catering to fans of Romance, Action, Fantasy, or LGBTQ genres. Come back each day for our newest free manhwa, webtoon & manga giveaway events!
4. Tailored Recommendations Just for You
We push personalized and captivating manhwa & manga suggestions that perfectly align with your interests.
5. Free Downloads and Offline Reading Convenience
No Internet? Download your preferred stories at no cost and enjoy them offline, ideal for travel or time killing.
 
Trending Manhwa & Manga, Webtoon at WebComics™

WebComics™ features over 5 million reads of webtoon, manga and manhwa on numerous genres, allowing you to access these manga & manhua without the need to purchase physical copies!
 
Top-ranking Author Team
Join our diverse community of WebComics authors from around the globe! Our talented webtoon & comic creators produce captivating content daily. Don't miss out on the opportunity to be a part of our brilliant team!
Send us your work right now! Email: comiceditor@webcomicsapp.com
 
Follow Us 
Download WebComics™ today and follow us on WebComics Social Media
Facebook: @WebComicsOfficial
Twitter: @Webcomics_app
Instagram: @WebComicsOfficial
Website: https://webcomicsapp.com/
Customer Service Email: Webcomics@sidewalkgroup.com

$5.99/month for Premium
$17.99/quarter for Premium
$69.99/year for Premium
$69.99/month for PLUS

- A subscription is automatically renewed unless auto-renew is disabled no later than 24 hours before the current subscription period expires.

Osamh Movies – منصتك المتكاملة للترفيه المجاني بجودة استثنائية

استعد لتجربة ترفيهية لا مثيل لها مع Osamh Movies، التطبيق الذي يجمع بين أحدث الأفلام، والمسلسلات، والأنمي، وأقوى البطولات الرياضية، بما في ذلك البث المباشر للقنوات المشفّرة، وكل ذلك مجانًا وبدون تسجيل.

 ماذا يقدّم لك Osamh Movies؟

 أفلام حديثة بجودات عالية
استمتع بأحدث الإصدارات السينمائية العربية والعالمية بجودات تصل إلى 1080p, BluRay, وWEB-DL.

 مكتبة مسلسلات متجددة
تابع أقوى المسلسلات من مختلف التصنيفات: دراما، أكشن، إثارة، كوميديا والمزيد.

 أنمي مترجم بتصنيفات واضحة
لمحبي الأنمي: مكتبة ضخمة ومنسقة بعناية مع تحديثات مستمرة وترجمة احترافية.

 تغطية شاملة لعالم كرة القدم
جدول مباريات يومي محدث حسب توقيت منطقتك، مع إشعارات للمباريات المهمة والبث المباشر للقنوات الرياضية الشهيرة.

 بث مباشر بدون تقطيع
شاهد قنوات رياضية مشفّرة بجودة عالية عبر مشغل داخلي مرن وسريع.

 مميزات التطبيق:

مشغل فيديو داخلي سريع يدعم تغييرات الجودة

واجهة استخدام سهلة، أنيقة، وداعمة للغة العربية

عرض توقيت المباريات بدقة حسب موقعك الجغرافي

إشعارات ذكية لمباريات الفرق التي تتابعها

بدون اشتراكات – بدون تسجيل – فقط افتح واستمتع

تطبيق Osamh TV هو وجهتك الأولى لمشاهدة القنوات العربية والعالمية بث مباشر بجودة عالية HD وبدون تقطيع. يوفر التطبيق تجربة مشاهدة مميزة تشمل القنوات الرياضية، الإخبارية، الدينية، والترفيهية بالإضافة إلى المسلسلات العربية التي تُعرض مباشرة داخل التطبيق دون الحاجة إلى روابط خارجية.

مع Osamh TV يمكنك متابعة أهم المباريات والبطولات العالمية والعربية لحظة بلحظة عبر مجموعة ضخمة من القنوات الرياضية المتجددة باستمرار. كما يمكنك الاستمتاع بمشاهدة القنوات الإخبارية العربية والعالمية لمتابعة أحدث الأحداث، إلى جانب القنوات الدينية وقنوات الأطفال والقنوات الترفيهية التي تناسب جميع أفراد العائلة.

يتميز التطبيق بتصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام تتيح للمستخدم التنقل بسرعة بين القنوات والفئات المختلفة، مما يجعل تجربة المشاهدة سلسة ومريحة. كما يتم تحديث التطبيق بشكل دوري لإضافة أحدث القنوات والباقات الجديدة وتحسين الأداء العام.

تطبيق Osamh TV يعتبر الخيار الأمثل لكل من يبحث عن تطبيق بث مباشر مجاني لمشاهدة القنوات العربية والعالمية في مكان واحد وبجودة HD عالية. التطبيق خفيف وسريع ويعمل بسلاسة على جميع الأجهزة دون انقطاع.

مميزات تطبيق Osamh TV:

يتمييز التطبيق بسهولة استخدامة بدون تسجيل دخول او اشتراك او تطبيق مشغل خارجي

بث مباشر لجميع القنوات العربية والعالمية بجودة HD ووضوح مذهل.

قنوات رياضية لمتابعة المباريات والبطولات العالمية والعربية.

قنوات دينية وقنوات إخبارية تعمل على مدار الساعة.

مشاهدة المسلسلات العربية مباشرة من التطبيق بدون روابط خارجية.

واجهة أنيقة وسهلة الاستخدام لجميع الأعمار.

تحديثات مستمرة لإضافة أحدث القنوات وتحسين الأداء.

خفيف وسريع بدون تقطيع أثناء المشاهدة حتى على الإنترنت البطيء.

تطبيق Osamh TV هو كل ما تحتاجه لمتابعة البث المباشر لجميع القنوات العربية والعالمية مجانًا في أي وقت ومن أي مكان.


المبرمج م/ اسامة فاضل

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

Foochia offers a comprehensive window into various worlds, including beauty, fashion, health, fitness, home decor, family, education, society, the world of fame, psychology, and more. Foochia transcends geographical boundaries to be a mirror that reflects the interests and issues of Arab women everywhere.

Foochia is a women's website specializing in women's affairs and concerns, in recognition of the privacy that women enjoy, through which their personality is completed and in light of which the features of their independent identity are determined.

We offer you this application to be a substitute for the Foochia website and to be an easy browsing tool.

Bikes World es la revista sobre Mountain Bike que se acerca a todos los aficionados de la bicicleta de montaña, ya sean nóveles o veteranos. Incluye pruebas de bicis, material, equipo y cuenta con la colaboración de expertos que son referentes en el sector de la Mountain Bike. La revista de bicicletas más práctica.

A PLAY Games é uma publicação mensal que concentra - há mais de dez anos - as maiores novidades, lançamentos, análises, dicas e curiosidades deste segmento. Sua especialidade são detonados, roteiros completos e minuciosos dos jogos mais populares da geração PlayStation.

Faça o download grátis da PLAY Games e compre edições avulsas ou assine diretamente do seu iPad, iPhone ou iPod Touch. 

• Assinatura auto-renovável PlayStation - Revista Oficial 

• Duração da assinatura e quantidade de edições enviadas durante a assinatura: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano (1 year subscription) – 12 edições 
• Assinatura de 6 meses (6 months subscription) – 6 edições 
• Assinatura de 1 mês (1 month subscription) – 1 edição 

• Preço da assinatura auto-renovável e edições avulsas: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano - Preço: US$ 30.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 6 meses - Preço: US$ 15.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 1 mês - Preço: US$ 2.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Edição avulsa – Preço: US$ 2.99 

• O pagamento será debitado da sua conta do iTunes no momento da confirmação da compra 

• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a renovação automática seja cancelada pelo menos 24 horas antes do final do período vigente 

• A renovação da sua assinatura será cobrada no prazo de 24 horas antes do final do período vigente e identificada o custo da renovação 

• As assinaturas podem ser gerenciados pelo usuário e a auto-renovação pode ser cancelada. Isso pode ser feito nas configurações da conta do usuário após a compra 

• Nenhum cancelamento da assinatura atual é permitida durante o período de assinatura vigente 

• Por favor, encontre nossos Termos e Condições e Política de Privacidade em: http://www.europanet.com.br/privacidade/ios/ 


Caso você seja assinante da revista impressa, basta entrar no app com seu e-mail e código de assinante para acessar suas revistas digitais gratuitamente. 

Qualquer dúvida, entre em contato com a nosso suporte técnico pelo e-mail: suportedigital@europanet.com.br

The magazine presents a range of creative productions, including the creation of characters who tell local stories with societal values ​​emanating from the Arab reality, and some of the characters produced in Japan, which we will present with an innovative local template that fits our culture and thought. It provides an enjoyable and safe experience, with high-end content and a simple Arabic language.

H&E is the leading monthly magazine aimed at naturists and all those who enjoy any aspects of their lifestyle without the restrictions of clothing. H&E originally stood for “health and efficiency”, the theory being that continued exposure to the sun and air, in combination with a good diet and regular exercise, was beneficial to health and made the body work more efficiently. Nowadays, naturism is more of a lifestyle choice with much less importance placed on the perfect body image – and more emphasis on travel, sunbathing, naked activities and, most of all, fun.

----------------------------------------------

The CNN app is your destination for unrivaled, fact-based reporting. Stay informed at every turn as the story breaks through short-form videos, interactives, articles, podcasts, live audio and more. Easily discover the day's top news from politics, health, world news, climate and beyond.

Download the CNN app to start making sense of the world today.

START STREAMING THE CNN EXPERIENCE TODAY.
Now watch unlimited streaming, including 24/7 global news, daily programs from trusted journalists, award-winning shows and films, and more.

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES.
Set custom alerts and notifications so you can follow developing stories. Our "live update" articles evolve as the news comes in, giving you accurate updates as they happen.

WATCH THE STORY UNFOLD.
See it for yourself with CNN’s live video or be in the know quickly with CNN Shorts.

STAY SHARP WITH EXPERT INSIGHTS.
Delivering in-depth analysis and context that matters from award-winning journalists, so you're prepared for what's next.

DIVE DEEPER WITH LIVE REPORTING.
Enjoy a 5-minute preview of CNN live. Unlock unlimited viewing, including CNN's original series and documentary collection, CNN, CNN International, and HLN by logging into your TV provider. Stay caught up with video clips, no login necessary.

TAKE A BREAK.
From travel and style news to the latest in entertainment, discover feel-good stories and get a daily dose of positivity.

LISTEN TO STAY CONNECTED.
Listen to top headlines anywhere you go with live audio from CNN, CNN en Español, CNN International and HLN. Hear the week's biggest and most talked-about stories with the "1 Thing" podcast.
 
DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTION (Available in the United States)
All Access plan - The premium CNN experience: streaming, exclusive videos, articles, and more.
• 24/7 global news
• Live coverage
• Exclusive videos
• Original series
• Award-winning films
• Unlimited articles

Basic plan - The basic CNN experience
• Unlimited articles

The New Yorker app is your digital destination for in-depth reporting, political and cultural commentary, fiction, and humor from New Yorker staff writers and contributors around the world.

Stay up to date. 
Read or listen to top stories from your favorite writers, every day. Turn on notifications so you never miss an important story or your favorite topic. 

Be transported.
News and politics. Books and culture. Fiction and poetry. Discover rich storytelling and rigorous reporting that will sweep you away and introduce you to something new. 

Go about your day.
When your hands are full, listen to featured stories read by world-class narrators. If you need a break, solve a crossword puzzle or Name Drop quiz, and flip through a nearly endless supply of cartoons. And, when you’re on the go, save stories to access them on any device, even offline.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Most current New Yorker subscribers have unlimited access to the app as part of their existing subscription. Subscribers with a print-only subscription may not have unlimited access. App subscribers have full access to the Web site, including the archive and most recent issue. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail apps@newyorker.com for assistance. 

Non-subscribers may access the app by starting a free trial. A subscription costs $11.99 a month or $119.99 annually, and includes a 7-day free trial, after which it will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will state the cost of renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by updating the user’s App Store Subscription settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

Information about our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy can be found at http://www.condenast.com/privacy-policy.

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES

Black Box Movie Listing App is a collection list of movies and TV shows that cater to diverse communities all around the world.  The app is a simple way to organize your movie collection, make a list of all your own movies, or your wish list movies that you aim to buy or watch later.  The app pulls movie and TV show information from the IMDb website. View details such as director, release date, casts, studio and etc in your offline list.

The Black Box Movie Listing App contains a 'News and Media' section that informs app users of diverse events that are occurring around the world.  Some of the news postings are detailed information on any newly released movies, TV shows, and local plays that are popular to the general population.  

Users can now purchase one of our in-app subscriptions to gain premium access to news content in the News & Media section.  The subscription also removes advertisement from specific areas of the Black Box app.  There are 3 different subscriptions to choose from:

 - Monthly Ad Removal Subscription - $6.99 USD
 - Annual Ad Removal Subscription - $39.99 USD
 - One Month Ad Removal Subscription - $9.99 USD

The duration for each subscription is one month.  For example, a if a user purchases February 22nd, their account will be charged on the 22nd of every month.  Users can opt out of the subscription anytime by going to the My Account section.

All Payments will be charged to our iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.  Your subscription will automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of your current period.  Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.  You can manage your subscriptions by turning off "auto-renewal" in the 'My Account' Settings after your purchase.

More features:
- View director(s), actors and actresses through out the video list
- Access to all available posters and images of the movies & TV shows. 
- Watch the movie trailer online.
- Add a note to your movies in your list.
- Share to social media platforms
- Stay up on international news/events
